div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1396 Eskisehir (anc. Dorylaeum) environs, Phrygia, 1953 Burial: c. 315 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 80 AV Philip II: 3 post. st. (Abydus 1, Colophon 1, unc. mint 1) Alexander III: 2+ early post. st. (Abydus) Philip III: 58+ st. (Abydus) Disposition: ANS 5 (SNGBerry 150-4) List of varieties and photos of 3 additional coins (1 Philip II, 2 Philip III) in ANS
